Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. Add egg; mix well. Combine the flours, lemon peel, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt; add to creamed mixture alternately with milk, beating well after each addition. Stir in dates.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 in. apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 325 degrees F for 13-15 minutes or until golden brown. remove to wire racks to cool. Store in an airtight container.
